item.title: About
item.description: Hi there # My name is Antriana and I’m a pretty lady. We all know how hard is to start something on the web, especially these days. You need to prepare a bunch of stuff, configure them and when that’s done — create the content. This theme is pretty basic and covers all of the essentials. All you have to do is start typing! The theme includes: light/dark mode, depending on your preferences great reading experience thanks to Inter UI font, made by Rasmus Andersson nice code highlighting thanks to PrismJS So, there you have it… enjoy!

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: "Hello, friend?" That's lame. Maybe I should give you a name?
